title: Heart of the Hunter: A Novella of Polyamory
description: Dakota Clark remembers dying.  Now reborn in a world where magic and those hurt by it have been unmasked. Desperate to leave her life as a witch hunter behind and be a good person, Dakota is thrust back into the role when she is forced to protect the lives of an old lover and the woman's new girlfriend.  Callie Wood rebelled against the magical world that raised her and exposed the masquerade. In doing so she betrayed the woman that loved her and caused her death. Attempting to live a normal life outside of the media spotlight she has moved on but still keeps a deep secret about her ability as a Healer. One that makes her a target for those that know it. Relentlessly pursued by an enemy that can possess anyone, rip any mind apart, to get what he wants Dakota finds herself drawn in ways she doesn't understand to both Callie and her new love. To keep them safe she will have to confront the sins of her past and the uncertainties of her future.
author: Alex  Foster
